text: We will hear arguments next in Lane against Williams and Southall.
Thank you, Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, this case is here on a petition for certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit.

Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, we are talking about a... just one issue in this case, and that is the fairness of a negotiated plea agreement where one of the sides to the agreement did not live up to its bargain.
